result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Maurice M Hines

defendant.name: Hines, Maurice M
defendant.address: 3310 West Silver Spring Drive #1, Milwaukee, WI 53209

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Maurice M Hines appeared by video.  Attorney Joel H. Rosenthal appeared by phone for Maurice M Hines.  Prosecuting attorney Tristan J. Bednarek appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Pre-trial conference held. Defense counsel needs discovery and an offer from the State and requests a scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.

Court ordered no contact with LJE (DOB: 07/02/1990); LRH (DOB: 02/22/2002); LDI (DOB: 10/27/1969)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Maurice M Hines appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jade K Hall appeared by video for Maurice M Hines.  Attorney Thomas L. Potter appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live at the discretion of the Court via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
